text: Zhao Yonghua (born 22 January 1969) is a Chinese female former track and field athlete who competed in the discus throw. She holds a personal best of , set in 1993 and which ranked her 13th globally for the season.Zhao Yonghua. Track and Field Statistics. Retrieved 2018-02-18. She was a finalist at the 1991 World Championships in Athletics and the 1988 World Junior Championships in Athletics.Yonghua Zhao. IAAF. Retrieved 2018-02-18. She was runner-up to compatriot Cao Qi at both the 1993 Asian Athletics Championships and the 1993 National Games of China.7th National Games medallists . jx918. Retrieved on 2013-03-30.Asian Championships. GBR Athletics.
